page.title: 14Recreation & leisure
page.content: There are only 2 activity centres, Sutton Barton Country Club and Umborne Village Hall.There is no public house. The village hall is used for bingo, farm produce,poultry & meat are prizes There is an active WI concerts, dances & jumble sales are regularly held.Over the years funds have been mounting for a new village hall. Until recently local children used to swim in the summer in the 'pool' a specially dug out deeper part of the Umborne Brook. A new pool in Honiton has caused a cessation of this activity. The Young Farmers Club at Honiton and Axminster appeal to teenagers who engage in raft building for the Axe River race & make floats for the local carnival season. Sutton Barton appeals to the younger element with its pub like activities of darts, pooletc, whilst the retired people support the village hall.
